overview:
Lori Chee is a growth marketer who specializes in connecting customers to meaningful brands with predictive-behavior marketing practices. For more than 15 years, she has used a blend of online and offline strategies to fuel customer acquisition and retention in the telecommunications, consumer electronics, mobile and entertainment industries.

Prior to joining Cenoplex, she was the chief marketing officer for Kajeet, a mobile service and content platform for kids, where she redirected retail distribution to create a more profitable e-commerce business model. She also developed brand identity as well as strategic partnerships and distribution channels for Ooma as vice president of marketing.

As the vice president of content distribution and marketing at MTV Networks, Lori led the monetization, packaging and marketing of entertainment content for television, the Internet and mobile platforms for 15 music-related channels and drove brand loyalty via partnership campaigns with Comcast, DIRECTV and Time Warner Cable.

As a member of the founding team that established DIRECTV as the fastest growing consumer electronics product of its time, she led the companyâ€™s new subscriber acquisition division and e-commerce efforts during the shift to a direct-to-consumer sales model.

Lori regularly advises and presents to venture-backed companies on how to target lucrative audiences and prove corporate business models to raise additional capital.

external_links.title: Cenoplex Names Lori Chee to Executive Vice President of Marketing and Client Services
